attributes.action: Remove the remaining laws restrixting the rights of Roman Catholics in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an age of equality for all it is an insult to the Catholic citizens that legal restrictions still apply to them. While it is true that they have little real impact upon most of us it is still gravely offensive to us that we can practice our faith under an Act of Toleration while others practice their faith as a right. Th Consistutions restrictions on Roman Catholics must be removed.
